name: Bob's Morse Adventure
description:
Game developed for Women game jam 2020, using the theme "Together but apart"

Controls: Use the spacebar to interact and make letters into morse code

In the game, the player needs to code the planet and boy's messages into morse code so they can interact. For each message, the player only needs to code the first letter into morse code.

Use the space button to code the letter into morse code, and watch the star turn on and off as you go.
